explains: n. 指示，标示；象征，暗示，迹象
wordGroup: give clear indication of 注明
visual indication 目测（指示）；可见指示

sentences.en: There is no indication which way the vote could go.
sentences.cn: 没有迹象表明投票的结果会怎么样。

sentences.en: He searched Hill's impassive face for some indication that he understood.
sentences.cn: 他在希尔没有表情的脸上搜寻着一些他理解的迹象。

sentences.en: There had been no indication of either breathlessness or any loss of mental faculties right until his death.
sentences.cn: 直到去世，他既没有出现呼吸困难也没有脑功能丧失的迹象。
